## Problem

What problem does this solve? What are you unable to do right now?

## Proposed Solution

Describe the feature you'd like to see. Be as specific as possible.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you tried any workarounds? Are there other ways to solve this?

## Additional Context

Mockups, examples from other tools, or any other relevant context.
